mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, -- Fecha formateada a 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.SSS' strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', i.fechalanzamiento) AS i_fechaLanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxDia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatoRenta, i.genero AS i_genero, ti.id AS ti_id, ti.descripcion AS ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS i LEFT JOIN VI_TIPOITEM ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id = ti.id WHERE i.id = #{id}
